resources.string: Use menu to add new notes.
A new version of OI Notepad is available.\n%s\nWould you like to upgrade?

Version %s 

 The OpenIntents Notepad is based on Google's open source sample application Notepad that is provided with the Android SDK. OI Notepad allows to create, edit, and delete notes.

OpenIntents allows different Android applications to share data using intents and open interfaces.

 For more information and other great applications visit OpenIntents at www.openintents.org

"This application is based on Google's open source sample application Notepad that is provided with the Android SDK, licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0.
